VpFCgQ6cCCw3FR-tsUiBsg.text: Barburrito is unique, fantastic, overwhelming, showstopping and better than mediocre.  Barburrito es fantastico y bueno.  lg laura y (and) anna

7-vh49rHGQ211tzvLMcT8A.text: Really cool atmosphere and super classic, yummy food. It doesn't quite compare to an American burrito joint, but I was very happy with my food. The ingredients are fresh and high quality and contrary to what I read in some reviews, I think the food is quite flavorful (just not spicy).

hPDyfVB2thgg8wMwx1MIkg.text: This is the Chipotle of the UK. I am from the states, and do like Chipotle so this place is perfect for me. Not super authentic Mexican food, but tasty. You build your own burrito just like Chipotle with much of the exact same options.

9TIJZTxlgsFq_lSPgQr6-Q.text: Reliably great taste and portion sizes.

U4IyngcC-c5B-ohawJEuNA.text: It's no Chipotle, but it will do in a pinch if you need a burrito. Be warned, not nearly as much flavor as in a Chipotle (or really any American restaurant's) burrito.   I've come here a few times. The steak can be tough so I tend to avoid it and go for the chicken. I'm also not a big fan of the beans so I stick with the veg.

RWfOhhw7IS67YPo_nMHDzw.text: A cool burrito place, mostly good for takeaway.  - Their small burrito is for 5.50 and regular is for 6.50.  - Not the cheapest but you can get a 20% student discount. - The burritos are delicious. You have a choice of spicy and normal beans, many meat fillings but I got the vegetarian peppers and mushrooms. - The salsa is the shit, the 4 options of salsa go from chopped tomatoes to extra-hot. - Well-wrapped good burritos for a full mean or even two!
